alert.note: Alert for Douglas (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Duluth (Northeast Minnesota and Northern Wisconsin)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 16 at 6:00PM CDT by NWS Duluth
info.description: ...STRONG THUNDERSTORMS WILL IMPACT PORTIONS OF NORTHERN CARLTON AND NORTHWESTERN DOUGLAS COUNTIES THROUGH 615 PM CDT... At 559 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from Scanlon, to 6 miles north of Kettle River, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow unsecured objects around. Minor hail damage to outdoor objects is possible. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Cloquet, Scanlon, Carlton and Thomson around 605 PM CDT. Proctor and Oliver around 610 PM CDT. Superior, Hermantown and Fond Du Lac Band Cloquet Area around 615 PM CDT. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: Anyone outdoors, including anyone on or in the water, should seek shelter inside a sturdy building or hard topped vehicle. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until midnight CDT for northeastern Minnesota...and northwestern Wisconsin.
